title: Smart Data Models - WindGenTurbineType3IEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Generator model for wind turbines of IEC type 3A and 3B.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindGenTurbineType3IEC

WindAeroLinearIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind aerodynamic model associated with this wind generator type 3 model. Default: None

WindContPType3IEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind control P type 3 model associated with this wind turbine type 3 model. Default: None

WindContPitchAngleIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind control pitch angle model associated with this wind turbine type 3. Default: None

WindMechIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind mechanical model associated with this wind turbine Type 3 model. Default: None

dipmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum active current ramp rate (di). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

diqmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum reactive current ramp rate (di). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0
